title: ELEMENTAL

photo.imgAlt: Image from Music Gallery Desiderium performance

desc: Our debut concert, ELEMENTAL, for The Music Gallery's You In Mind series. The first half of the program features works by Matthew Shlomovitz, Pauline Oliveros, Julia Mermelstein, and Nolan Hildebrand. The second half featured our epic multimedia tribute to the four elements of nature, the Elemental Suite.

program.title: All Fours for the Drum Bum

shortDesc: Our debut concert, ELEMENTAL, for The Music Gallery's You In Mind series. The first half of the program features works by Matthew Shlomovitz, Pauline Oliveros, Julia Mermelstein, and Nolan Hildebrand. The second half featured our epic multimedia tribute to the four elements of nature, the Elemental Suite.

title: Behaviours: Play

program.title: 0 Damage Any % Reverse Glitch Speed Run

photo.imgAlt: Image from ArrayMusic Speed Run performance

desc: In February of 2024, we performed a program designed around the idea of play for ArrayMusic's Behaviours series. In this program we debuted our performance of Jet Kye Chong's Anticommunication, as well as two new compositions, Feedback Dreams and 0% Any Damage Reverse Glitch Speed Run.
shortDesc: In February of 2024, we performed a program designed around the idea of play for ArrayMusic's Behaviours series. In this program we debuted our performance of Jet Kye Chong's Anticommunication, as well as two new compositions, Feedback Dreams and 0% Any Damage Reverse Glitch Speed Run

title: Horse Idoling Zone
desc: We'll be playing a set at the next PonyHAUS show, Horse Idoling Zone! This show is a triple bill with G.A.G. and Daniel Tapper. Not much to talk about here...it hasn't happened yet!
shortDesc: We'll be playing a set at the next PonyHAUS show! This show is a triple bill with G.A.G. and Daniel Tapper.

title: TRANZAC Residency

photo.imgAlt: Image from ArrayMusic Speed Run performance

desc: We will be one of the Ensembles in Residence at The TRANZAC from May to October of 2024. We'll be hosting a variety of shows, bringing together artists from different genres and backgrounds for six performances.
shortDesc: We will be one of the Ensembles in Residence at The TRANZAC from May to October of 2024. We'll be hosting a variety of shows, bringing together artists from different genres and backgrounds for six performances.
